R2: executed_by('conduct interview and questionnaire', 'physician') or executed_by('conduct interview and questionnaire', 'trained assistant')
R3: parallel('retract consent', 'direct questions') and directly_follows('retract consent', 'terminate')
R4: timed_alternative('monitor patient', 'assess donor', 900) and executed_by('assess donor', 'physician')
R5: data_value_alternative_eventually_follows('assessment_status == "rejected" ', 'inform of rejection') and directly_follows('inform of rejection', 'terminate')
R7: activity_receives('conduct interview and questionnaire', 'assessment_status') and activity_receives('direct questions', 'assessment_status')
